resources.string:
Spotter is an Android App designed by Gil Silva and Filipe Martins as a first step to study the new Android Things for Raspberry 3.

 Its main goal is to take a picture, save it in a cloud database, analyse that photo with the support of sighthound API in order to detect if it recognizes a person and if so, save in a Firebase Database the information of te detection - for now just the hour of the detection.

 It is the first step in starting to develop IoT applications in Android Things.
